Windlord:

Windlrod picked up the signal he looked to the caverman and his pal 
Kup and said "Kup warn this bot for Preds a co.... I have to go to 
check a help signal

Windlord left the base and  opened his comlink "I'm going to help 
you!!!! don't close the signal"

Windlord flew as quick as he can, soon he would be there
